title_en: Repent and believe the gospel
quote: God’s love is so real that He created you to prove it.

questions: Are you cold, lukewarm or hot? Do you have an earnestly desire to follow Jesus to glorify your Father in heaven with your whole life?
Share your testimony!
With which other christians would you like to walk through all the commandments?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To know that G-d exists
To know that G-d exists

title_en: Get baptized

questions: Did you already get baptized?
Tell each other your testimony why you got baptized

title_en: Follow Me
quote: Following Jesus: It's not a responsibility, it's a desire

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To imitate His good and upright ways

title_en: Therefore bear fruits worthy of repentance
title_negative_en: He cuts off every branch in me that bears no fruit

questions: Do you recognize any fruits in your life?
Tell each other how you recognize their fruits

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To be fruitful and multiply

title_en: You shall worship the LORD your God, and Him only you shall serve
title_negative_en: No servant can serve two masters
quote: Worship is the activity of the human soul

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: Not to entertain the idea that there is any god but the Eternal
To pray to G-d
To know that G-d is One, a complete Unity
To cleave to those who know Him
Not to hearken to one who prophesies in the name of an idol

title_en: Pray the Lord of the harvest to send out laborers into His harvest
Take a day off in the week
title_negative_en: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To rest on the first day of Passover
To sanctify Shabbat
Not to do work on Shabbat
To rest on Shabbat
To rest on Shabbat
To rest on the seventh day of Passover
To rest on the seventh day of Passover
To rest on Shavu'ot
To rest on the Yom Kippur

title_en: Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature
quote: It is no use walking anywhere to preach unless our walking is our preaching

questions: Paul tells his own testimony to defend himself. Have you also shared your testimony to others to explain the gospel? What was their reaction?
Who cares about our agenda for telling the world about Jesus?

title_en: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven
title_negative_en: Don’t rely on your own strenght
quote: Your successful past will block your visions of the future

title_en: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted
Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth
Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled
Blessed are the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy
quote: Start by doing what is necessary; then do what’s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible

questions: During the day, do you pay attention for people around you who need help?
When was the last time you were merciful?

title_en: Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God
title_negative_en: Go, and sin no more
quote: While you are proclaiming peace with your lips, be careful to have it even more fully in your heart

questions: Ask others, what kind of sins do they see with you?
Pray for each other
What sins do you want to get rid off?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To remove chametz on the Eve of Passover

title_en: Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God
Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness' sake: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
quote: The greater the struggle, the more glorious the triumph

title_en: Rejoice, and be exceeding glad: for great is your reward in heaven
quote: Joy is a good feeling in the sool, produced by the holy spirit, as he causes us to see the beauty of Christ, in His Word and in His work

title_en: Have salt in yourselves, and have peace one with another
quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand

questions: Can you be graciously confrontational?
Has sin corrupted your saltiness?
Has your self-interest made you disinterested in transforming others?

title_en: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven
quote: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows

title_en: Whoever practices and teaches these commands will be called great in the kingdom of heaven
title_negative_en: Do not set aside one of the least of these commands
quote: Jesus was not creating a new area of ethics here; He was simply drawing out implications in OT law.

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To learn Torah and to teach it
That every person shall write a scroll of the Torah for himself

title_en: Don’t be angry at your brother without a cause. If you will be, reconcile as quickly as possible
title_negative_en: Let not the sun go down upon your wrath
quote: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger

title_en: Eliminate any cause of temptation
quote: This book will keep you from sin, or sin will keep you from this book

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: Always to remember what Amalek did
To destroy the seed of Amalek
That the evil done to us by Amalek shall not be forgotten

title_en: Honor marriage
title_negative_en: Do not look lustfully to a woman

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To decide in cases of annulment of vows, according to the rules set forth in the Torah
Not to break a vow

title_en: Keep your word
title_negative_en: Don’t act different from what you speak
quote: What you think influences what you speak and what you speak influences what you do

questions: Does your speaking suit your behavior?
Is there a difference between your confession and your doing?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To restore that which one took by robbery
To make confession before the L-rd of any sin that one has committed, when bringing a sacrifice and at other times
To return lost property
To set the mother-bird free when taking the nest
To lend to an alien at interest
That a man should fulfill whatever he has uttered
To pay wages to the hired man at the due time

title_en: Whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek, turn to him the other also
title_negative_en: Do not resist evil

title_en: Share goods with the needy
title_negative_en: If anyone takes what belongs to you, do not demand it back
quote: For it is in giving that we receive

questions: When was the last time you were generous?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To lend to a poor person
To adjudicate cases of inheritances
To release debts in the seventh year
To give charity according to one's means
To give the kohein the due portions of the carcass of cattle
To give the first of the fleece to the kohein
To return a pledge to its owner

title_en: Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you
title_negative_en: Do not say, I’ll do to them as they have done to me
quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love

questions: Do you really want to be a follower of Jesus?
Enemies are the people who God puts on your way which are hard for you to love. Who are enemies for you?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To love all human beings who are of the covenant

title_en: Therefore you shall be perfect, just as your Father in heaven is perfect
quote: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.

questions: Do you have the idea that you are what God intended you to be?
What would happen if you were as God intended?
What would stop you from becoming the way you were meant to be?

title_en: Be generous (and fasten and pray) in secret
Pray in faith according to the wil of the Father
quote: Those who say, 'It can't be done,' are usually interrupted by others doing it.

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To pray to G-d
To pray to G-d

title_en: If you forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you
quote: Forgiveness is not an emotion. It is an act of the will.

questions: Are we prepared, out of love for Jesus, the Father and the other, to do what is necessary so that a relationship can be restored, to give satisfaction so that complete reconciliation becomes possible?
Are we willing to forgive the other out of love for Jesus, the Father and the other, regardless of whether or not the other asks for forgiveness?
Are we willing to give up our rights for reconciliation out of love for Jesus, the Father and the other?
Are we willing to step into a conflict and be accountable for love for Jesus, the Father and the other and to ask forgiveness for all guilt in which we do or do not participate?

title_en: Fast regularly
quote: Physical obedience brings spiritual release

questions: Do you apply regular fasting in your life?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To fast on Yom Kippur

title_en: Lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven
quote: If you keep doing what you did, you will keep getting what you always got

questions: What are your treasures?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To adjudicate cases of purchase and sale

title_en: Seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things shall be added to you
title_negative_en: Do not worry about your life

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To cleave to those who know Him (Equivalent to Cleaving to Him)

title_en: First cast out the beam out of thine own eye; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother’s eye
title_negative_en: Do not judge, or you too will be judged

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To rebuke the sinner

title_en: Seek, and you will find
Knock, and it shall be opened unto you
Therefore, whatever you want men to do to you, do also to them

questions: What is better? That others love you for who you are, or that others love you because they are loving people?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To love the stranger
To make a parapet for your roof

title_en: Strive to enter in at the strait gate
quote: if I fail, I try again, and again, and again if you fail are you going to try again?

title_en: Beware of false prophets
title_negative_en: Dear friends, do not believe every spirit

title_en: Listen to Jesus, understand and obey
quote: When a man listens, God speaks. If a man obeys, God acts. When a man prays, God gives strength.

questions: If you want to grow in applying your faith, what does that take?
Once you know what He says, can you trust it?
What keeps people away from God's Truth?
What makes it difficult for you to listen, understand and obey?

title_en: Be of good cheer
title_negative_en: Be not afraid
quote: Courage is when you overcome fear

title_en: Be moved with inner compassion with the people around you

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To relieve a neighbor of his burden and help to unload his beast
To assist in replacing the load upon a neighbor's beast

title_en: Be wise as serpents and harmless as doves
title_negative_en: Do not throw your pearls to pigs

title_en: Fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell
title_negative_en: Be not afraid of them that kill the body, and after that have no more that they can do

bible_ref_author: Churches throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To revere the Sanctuary
To fear Him reverently
To fear Him reverently
To assemble the people to hear the Torah at the close of the seventh year

title_en: Tell to people boldly, what Jesus says to you
title_negative_en: Do not be afraid of them

questions: How bold is your witness?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To put tzitzit on the corners of clothing

title_en: Love God above all

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To love G-d

title_en: Deny yourself, take up a cross, and follow Jesus

questions: Will you give up your life to follow Christ?

title_en: Receive him whom I will send
title_negative_en: It is a sin to despise one’s neighbor

title_en: Blessed is he who does not offend Me

questions: Who do you want as your worst enemy: the world or God?

title_en: Take My yoke upon you and learn from Me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls
quote: Jesus is the beast of burden that wants to form that team with us

title_en: Calm words are a tree of life
quote: Words which do not give the light of Christ increase the darkness

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To hallow G-d's name

title_en: Do the will of the Father
Give to the emperor what is from the emperor, and to God what is from God
Unless you are converted and become as little children, you will by no means enter the kingdom of heaven

questions: Jesus  talks  much  about  the  Kingdom  of  God  in  His  ministry.  What is the Kingdom of God, and what does it mean to receive it?
What characteristics of children does Jesus want His disciples to recognize and emulate in receiving His Kingdom?
What would it look like in your work, finances, relationships, and neighborhood to receive the Kingdom of God like a child?
Why  is  receiving  Jesus  and  His  Kingdom  better  than  anything  this world has to offer?

title_en: Whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me
Desire something in union on the earth, and it will fall to you from My Father who is in heaven
Blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it

questions: Once you know what He says, can you trust it?

title_en: Take heed, and beware of covetousness

questions: Do you recognize one of the symptoms for greed mentioned in the description?

title_en: Look forward to the wedding of the Lamb

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To hear the sound of the shofar on Rosh Hashanah
To rejoice on the festivals

title_en: Find the lost sheep
In every thing give thanks
quote: It is not happiness that makes you grateful, but gratitude makes you happy

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To recite grace after meals

title_en: Honor your father and your mother

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To honor father and mother
To reverently fear father and mother

title_en: Many that are first shall be last; and the last shall be first
title_negative_en: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To honor the old and the wise
To show honor to a kohein, and to give him precedence in all things that are holy

title_en: Have faith in God
quote: Fear is the glue that keeps you stuck. Faith is the solvent that sets you free.

questions: How do you know what somebody believes in?
What do you think believe is all about?

bible_ref_author: Sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh

title_en: You shall love the LORD your God with all your heart, with all your soul, with all your mind, and with all your strength
quote: Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life

questions: Do you truly love Jesus? If you did, how would you know?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To read the Shema in the morning and at night
To bind tefillin on the arm
To bind tefillin on the head
To affix the mezuzah to the doorposts and gates of your house

title_en: You shall love your neighbor as yourself
quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To love all human beings who are of the covenant

title_en: Watch therefore for the coming of Jesus

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To rest on Rosh Hashanah
To hear the sound of the shofar on Rosh Hashanah

title_en: Use your talents to honor the Father
quote: One of the greatest diseases is to be nobody to anybody

questions: Do you pray: Lord, will you bless what I have sown? Or: Lord, what do you want me to sow?
What talents do you use to glorify the Father?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To sanctify the firstling of clean cattle and offer it up
To set apart a portion of the dough for the kohein

title_en: Trust that the Spirit will guide you
title_negative_en: Do not worry about what to say
quote: Pray, and let God worry.

questions: Imagine yourself on trial for your faith

title_en: Celebrate the Lord’s supper in remembrance of Me

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: To eat matzah on the first night of Passover
To discuss the departure from Egypt on the first night of Passover

title_en: Strengthen your brethren
quote: Look for an opportunity to be a Barnabas, an encourager. There are undoubtedly many people in your path today that need some encouragement. It’s an important ministry

questions: Have you met someone like Jonathan, who visited you to encourage you to put your faith in God?

bible_ref_ot_rambam_title: That the kohanim shall bless Israel

title_en: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit
title_negative_en: For without me ye can do nothing

title_en: We are called to glorify the Name of God in Christ Jesus!
quote: God is most glorified in us, when we are most satisfied in Him

title_en: Feed my sheep
Go therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you

questions: Are you a disciple?
Could you still be a disciple today? If so, how would that look like? If not, why not?
What do you think is a disciple?
What is discipleship about?

title_en: And, behold, I am with you always, even unto the end of the world
quote: No matter who you are, no matter what you’re going through, God knows it. He is with you. He is going to pull you through
